Great game. Valve has fixed Trustfactor and i've encountered more hackers than ever before, Played with a mg1 friend (me being gn3 at the time) and opponents were full stack mge-lem while we had mg, 2x gn3 and one sem. just finished a match with gn3 and sem friends. opponents were gn2-mg1 and our team had 3x sem and 2 gn3. would i recommend? Hell no until Valve decides to actually fix their game. Do I still wanna lose more brain cells for Valves ignorance to their game being a piece of garbage? Maybe
